title: Relates to transportation of students to school
summary: Relates to transportation of students to school; provides that upon a resolution adopted by the board of education a parent who is precluded from walking his or her child to school or bus stop because of an existing medical condition and the route that the child must walk is determined by such board to be unsafe, transportation may be provided to such child.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to transportation of students to school
